import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Nav, Navbar, NavItem, NavbarBrand, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import data from './data.js' function Home(props) { const [users, setUsers] = useState(data) const deleteUser = (id) => setUsers( users.filter((user) => { user.id === id }) ) return (
